item.title: Guardian to help keep children safe
item.description: The NSW Government has unveiled new initiatives to tackle child protection among Aboriginal children and youth in the hope of reducing the rate of young people in state care.

item.title: 700 Victorian travellers turned away
item.description: More than 700 travellers from Victoria have been refused entry into Queensland since tough new border restrictions were enforced on Friday.

item.title: Hospital staff to wear masks 24/7
item.description: Workers at a hospital in Melbourne’s east have been ordered to wear face masks at all times from Wednesday.

item.title: ‘Not over’: Social distancing here to stay
item.description: Australians are being put on notice and urged to continue social distancing as Victoria reintroduces restrictions on Wednesday night.

item.title: Suburbs where crime is exploding
item.description: Some of Sydney’s most prestigious suburbs are becoming home to growing crime rates.

item.title: ‘I can’t breathe!’ Dramatic tower arrest
item.description: A man working with a youth charity was arrested outside a locked-down public housing tower in Flemington, Melbourne, just before 10pm on Tuesday night while trying to deliver food to residents.

item.title: ‘Massive queues’: Supermarkets overrun
item.description: Panicked customers have rushed to Coles and Woolworths in Melbourne as lockdown measures come into force.

item.title: Market slides as lockdown hurts confidence
item.description: Shares closed lower on Tuesday after a choppy trading day, with large-scale Victorian lockdowns overshadowing signals by the central bank of an economic recovery.

item.title: COVID-19 invades Melbourne hospital
item.description: A Melbourne hospital will temporarily divert some ambulances to other hospitals as a coronavirus outbreak in the facility’s emergency department grows.

item.title: AFP swoops on child abuse stash
item.description: Australian Federal Police have swooped on a man living in Sydney’s eastern suburbs who allegedly shared child abuse material with a minor.
